manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AmazonCommercial Angle Broom with Metal Handle - 6-Pack

Set of 6 Convenience and functionality come together in the angled broom set, which includes six bristle brooms with metal handles. For Heavy-Duty Floors Designed to pick up fine particles from hard floors, the broom features an angled brush head that can access corners and hard-to-reach places. Flagged Bristles Featuring stiff polypropylene bristles with flagged tips, the broom offers a 9 inch sweep face with a 6-1/4 inch trim length. Metal Handle For use in commercial, industrial, and residential settings, the angled bristle broom features a durable metal handle with a powder-coated finish.

Where are these brooms intended to be used? The brooms are ideal for use in commercial environments for housekeeping and maintenance. What floors do the brooms work on? The brooms are ideal for sweeping dirt and debris from smooth, dry surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't really expecting much....
reviews.reviewText: Especially with such a low price point.....BUT.....I'm really pleased with this purchase. I purchased these to add to our collection in a restaurant. We go through an absolute rediculous amount of brooms. We've tried thick wooden handle, but staff members still manage to break them in half. Weve went the super cheap route, that way atleast im not surprised when they are found in pieces. Some weekends, staff members will argue over brooms, and even hide them so that they can be the first to use it- while everyone else gets to hang out and wait. Who really thought that a broom can be detrimental for restaurant staff getting along. Its all fun and games, until someone needs a broom!!!!Anywho, I invested in fiberglass brooms for the kitchen ($$$), and these are designated to the dining room and bar. Theyre super easy to spray off as need. We love the taller handles, which seem very sturdy. They are light weight, easy to assemble, seem pretty sturdy, are oh so affordable, and have stopped employees from arguing and hiding brooms. Overall, I couldn't be happier. Hopefully they last longer than others, but even if my crew manages manage to destroy them- I can just come back and order more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very satisfied with the sturdiness of these brooms
reviews.reviewText: Bought these brooms to try them out for sweeping horse stalls January 2022.One month shy of a year & these brooms are all as good as they were when new, except one.Poor broom was left in the stall & the horse must have thought it to be a snake.Good part of this only the handle took a beating & because these handles are a standard thread in style, a wooden replacement handle got this broom back into service.In years past we have gone through several brooms in a year, but not these.Best Barn broom ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price and they work but a little smaller than I wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got 6 brooms for $20 because they had been returned to Amazon.
reviews.reviewText: What's not to like about a great deal on six, sturdy, well made brooms? The handles are long so I dont have to bend to sweep. Bristles are heavy and stiff to get every bit of debris from the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You can make this a 5 star product....
reviews.reviewText: These brooms drove me crazy until...I added a little gorilla glue in hole that connects the broomstick.It worked PERFECTLY! Now it is worth every penny. Try it; you will be happy.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality n great value
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that the handles are longer than your average broom especially if u are taller than 5’6 the reach is better the brooms are high qualitySturdy n great bristles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought these broom for my Kindergarteners to help sweep the room. I had to have them cut down so the little darlings could use them. They really like them and they are learning how to sweep. Love them.
